### Deployments & Changes
- Temporary hard cap instituted for two experimental tenants due to quota overload.
- Expanded verifier worker pool and reran verification after failures.
- Enabled batching and increased metadata DB write buffer during off-peak to address manifest backlog.
- Rebuild completed after 7.9 hours, triggered by pre-fail condition.

### Events
- Very heavy ingest (+224 TB) caused quota hard blocks to jump to 5; instituted temporary hard cap for two experimental tenants and escalated cleanup.
- Two snapshot verification failures due to verifier worker saturation and missing time window; expanded verifier worker pool and reran verification.
- Completed one rebuild triggered by earlier pre-fail; rebuild took 7.9 hours and increased compaction pending due to backfill I/O.
- Metadata manifest backlog grew to 4.5k; enabled batching and increased metadata DB write buffer during off-peak.

### On-Call
- Shift: Riley J. 9 pages. 17 tickets. Status: Degraded; primary issues were quota incidents and verification failures under load. Capacity remains tight; mitigations applied (caps, verifier pool expansion, batching).
